channel.title: Comments on: Strawberry Fraisier – Daring Bakers Challenge July 2011

item.title: By: Miss Tiny
item.dc:creator: Miss Tiny
item.description: Girl, your blog rocks!!! It's in my favorite links. I was looking for recipes with maltose and found your tropical snow egg. It's amazing. I will try those maltose tuiles. Anyway, I just want to say how much I like your blog. Cheers. PS: I'm Franch and the French word for "strawberry" is "fraise" so this is why we call this cake "fraisier". In that case, you don't need to put strawberry in front of fraisier... but it's not important as long as it tastes good!!! ;-)
item.content:encoded:
Girl, your blog rocks!!!
It’s in my favorite links. I was looking for recipes with maltose and found your tropical snow egg. It’s amazing. I will try those maltose tuiles. Anyway, I just want to say how much I like your blog.
Cheers.
PS: I’m Franch and the French word for “strawberry” is “fraise” so this is why we call this cake “fraisier”. In that case, you don’t need to put strawberry in front of fraisier… but it’s not important as long as it tastes good!!! ðŸ˜‰

item.description: It looks perfect :) just take it out of the room while cutting it up ;) haha
item.content:encoded: It looks perfect ðŸ™‚ just take it out of the room while cutting it up ðŸ˜‰ haha

item.title: By: Charis
item.dc:creator: Charis
item.description: That looks absolutely stunning!! And I just saw your V8 cake post..let me just say I'm in awe!! wow!
item.content:encoded:
That looks absolutely stunning!!
And I just saw your V8 cake post..let me just say I’m in awe!! wow!

item.title: By: Lay
item.dc:creator: Lay
item.description: Hi :) Great work! You're work on the Daring Baker's challenge motivated me to register with them to try out different recipes! 1st August will be my 1st challenge. Really nice blog and you make really nice desserts too! :) Cheers.
item.content:encoded: Hi ðŸ™‚ Great work! You’re work on the Daring Baker’s challenge motivated me to register with them to try out different recipes! 1st August will be my 1st challenge. Really nice blog and you make really nice desserts too! ðŸ™‚ Cheers.

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description: Lovely fraisier, and very delicious dessert! Love the dusted top and how the tips of your strawberry slices slightly stick out, it looks artistic!
item.content:encoded: Lovely fraisier, and very delicious dessert! Love the dusted top and how the tips of your strawberry slices slightly stick out, it looks artistic!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Good work! Holding together seems to be the only problem with this....but yours looks wonderful!
item.content:encoded: Good work! Holding together seems to be the only problem with this….but yours looks wonderful!

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Lovely work on this challenge! Even though the cream isn't very sturdy, it looks like such a luxurious texture.
item.content:encoded: Lovely work on this challenge! Even though the cream isn’t very sturdy, it looks like such a luxurious texture.
